title: Microsoft Office
content: MS Office gets a fresh new look that I find quite inspiring - I like the assymetrical aspects of the mark and the fact that it is little less overt than some of their other ids.
author: dean

comments.content:
Here is the old one:   
   
 ![Old MS Office Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013165211im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/22888.gif)   
   
And the new one:   
   
 ![New MS Office Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013165211im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/22889.gif)

I agree.   
   
The new one is quite refreshing.
